cast.name: 蒂姆·斯奎尔斯 Tim Squyres
詹姆斯·夏慕斯 James Schamus

this_title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon - A Retrospective
introduction: Produced for 'Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon' 15th Anniversary 4K Remastered Blu-ray and Ultra HD Blu-ray, ''Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon - A Retrospective'' is a three-part feature in which Cultural Critic / Film Journalist Tasha R. Robinson interviews three key members of the filmmaking team.The first features Director Ang Lee discussing the film in In Conversation with Ang Lee (29:58). In Conversation with Tim Squyres (25:11) looks at how the American-born Editor cut the film, which was shot in Mandarin. Finally, In Conversation with James Schamus (25:59) features the Screenwriter and Producer discussing the film's worldwide success and his relationship with Lee.
foreign_title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon - A Retrospective
